body_html:
I know that I need the source code, else I can not use git.
The problem is, that I made the mistake to install tensorflow from source and hit weird bugs (Maybe I got a bad commit). Since then I use tensorflow binary and use a diff programme to sync the installed and the source code in the git repo because I only change python files. (As far as I know it is not possible to install tensorflow from binary (i.e. without bazel) as editable with the python files inside the git repo (i.e. git clone ... && cd tensorflow && pip install -e .).)

My question regarding the BUILD file is that I do not know what language it is or what style.
I know that it is not a Makefile, cmake, bash script and python.
Also, I do not know how to execute it (Likely something with bazel (problem) and not python).
So when I would write a BUILD file I would always guess.

Maybe I should keep the partial_reshape in my own code base until I understand how to add a new module and decided to build tensorflow. Or maybe someone has interest in partial_reshape and knows how to add a new module.

body:
I know that I need the source code, else I can not use git.
The problem is, that I made the mistake to install tensorflow from source and hit weird bugs (Maybe I got a bad commit). Since then I use tensorflow binary and use a diff programme to sync the installed and the source code in the git repo because I only change python files. (As far as I know it is not possible to install tensorflow from binary (i.e. without bazel) as editable with the python files inside the git repo (i.e. `git clone ... && cd tensorflow && pip install -e .`).)


My question regarding the BUILD file is that I do not know what language it is or what style.
I know that it is not a Makefile, cmake, bash script and python.
Also, I do not know how to execute it (Likely something with bazel (problem) and not python).
So when I would write a BUILD file I would always guess.

Maybe I should keep the `partial_reshape` in my own code base until I understand how to add a new module and decided to build tensorflow. Or maybe someone has interest in `partial_reshape` and knows how to add a new module.
